# Operations Planning Skill

## When to use
- The user requests deployment or reliability planning.

## Steps
1. Define environments and release flow.
2. Outline CI/CD and rollback plan.
3. Add monitoring, logs, and alerts.
4. Set SLO/SLI targets.
5. Include cost and capacity notes.
